scenes.description: A page-turn transition reveals the '2023 STARTUP Meet-up DAY' poster, followed by an exterior shot of a modern building, then a slow pan to show the event banner.
A close-up of the event banner outside the building, showing the event title, date, and location details.
An interior wide shot of the event venue, showcasing several promotional and operational booths with people interacting. Text overlay: '기관별 홍보 및 운영부스 (5개기관)'.
A medium shot of one of the booths, showing a person sitting at a table with a laptop and another person standing, engaging in conversation.
Another medium shot of a booth where two women are talking, one smiling. Text overlay: '기관별 홍보 및 운영부스 (5개기관)'.
A wide shot of a speaker on stage giving a lecture to an audience. A large banner behind him reads '창업 특강' (Startup Special Lecture).
A medium shot of the speaker, holding a microphone and gesturing while delivering the special lecture.
A close-up of an audience member listening intently to the lecture. Text overlay: '창업 특강'.
A close-up of a person taking notes during the lecture, emphasizing engagement. Text overlay: '창업 특강'.
A wide shot of the audience, showing multiple individuals listening to the speaker. Text overlay: '창업 특강'.
A swirl transition leads to a wide shot of another event area, where people are seated at tables with laptops for an 'IR 피칭 데이' (IR Pitching Day).
A medium shot of the speaker presenting during the 'IR Pitching Day', holding a microphone.
A medium shot of a judge or audience member typing on a laptop, evaluating the pitch. Text overlay: 'IR 피칭 데이'.
A close-up of a laptop screen displaying a presentation slide and a form, likely for evaluation. Text overlay: 'IR 피칭 데이'.
A wide shot of the 'IR Pitching Day' event, showing the speaker at the front and the judges/audience at tables.
A wide shot panning right across several booths set up for consultations, indicating a new activity. Text overlay: '분야별 전문가 멘토링' (Mentoring by experts in each field).
A two-shot of a mentor (wearing a mask) and a mentee at a booth, engaged in a discussion.
A close-up of the mentor, smiling, highlighting a positive interaction. Text overlay: '분야별 전문가 멘토링'.
Another two-shot of a mentor and mentee at a booth, looking at a laptop together. Text overlay: '분야별 전문가 멘토링'.
A close-up of the mentee writing notes on paper, showing active participation. Text overlay: '분야별 전문가 멘토링'.
A wide shot of a group of people at a table, with an instructor at the front, for a '3D펜 창업아이템 시제품 제작 체험교육' (3D pen startup item prototype production experience education).
A close-up of hands holding a 3D pen and white filament, demonstrating the tools for the workshop. Text overlay: '3D펜 창업아이템 시제품 제작 체험교육'.
A close-up of a screen displaying a diagram related to 3D printing concepts, used for instruction. Text overlay: '3D펜 창업아이템 시제품 제작 체험교육'.
A medium shot of the instructor explaining concepts to the participants during the 3D pen workshop. Text overlay: '3D펜 창업아이템 시제품 제작 체험교육'.
A medium shot of two participants listening attentively, with 3D pen filaments visible on the table. Text overlay: '3D펜 창업아이템 시제품 제작 체험교육'.
A close-up of hands holding and operating a 3D pen, actively creating a prototype. Text overlay: '3D펜 창업아이템 시제품 제작 체험교육'.
The final event poster is displayed, summarizing the event details as a closing graphic.

recurring_sequences: Wide shot of activity → Medium shot of key person/interaction → Close-up of detail/reaction (repeated across lecture, pitching, and workshop sections)
Two Shot → Close-up pattern for mentoring sessions
editing_patterns.dominant_camera_style: Predominantly static shots, with occasional slow pans and a single zoom-in to establish context. Transitions (page-turn, swirl) are used to mark major section changes.

narrative_structure: The video follows a clear chronological and thematic structure: an introduction establishing the event and venue, followed by distinct sections highlighting key activities (startup lecture, IR pitching, expert mentoring, 3D pen workshop), and concluding with a summary title card.
summary: This video effectively showcases a startup meet-up day through a series of concise, informative shots. The editing maintains a steady pace, using wide shots to establish context and medium/close-up shots to focus on speakers, participants, and specific activities. Text overlays clearly label each event section, enhancing clarity. The overall tone is professional and engaging, highlighting the diverse opportunities offered at the event.
